original: To continue you must §MZoom out§! so you can see all of Europe.
translation: 继续§M拉远镜头§!，整个欧洲尽收眼底了。

original: To continue you must §MZoom in as close as you can§!.
translation: §M尽可能拉近镜头§!以继续。

original: §YSelecting the Fleet (4/9)§!

Your troops are now attached to the Royal Navy in port Gwynedd. To transport your troops across the Irish Sea you need to select the fleet by clicking on it or by dragging the selection box over it.§W
translation: 玩家部队已经在格温内斯港连接上了皇家海军，点击或框选舰队运送部队穿越爱尔兰海。§W

original: Select the §MRoyal Navy§! located in the §MGwynedd port§!.
translation: 选择§M格温内斯港§!的§M皇家海军§!。

original: §YMoving the Fleet (5/9)§!
To move your fleet, right-click the §MIrish Sea§! sea province. Once your fleet moves out of port the attached units will be embarked on the ships.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§W
translation: 右键点击§M爱尔兰海§!海上省份移动舰队，当舰队离开港口时，连接的单位将会登上船只。\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏。§W

original: Send your fleet to the §MIrish Sea§! sea province to continue.
translation: 派遣舰队到达§M爱尔兰海§!海上省份以继续。

original: §YThe Embarked Army (6/10)§!
To disembark your troops, have the fleet selected and then click the §MTransport§! button to select your army.
translation: 选择舰队，然后点击§M运输§!按钮选择军队。

original: Select your §MEmbarked army§! to continue.
translation: 点选§M乘船军队§!以继续。

original: §YDisembarking the Army (7/10)§!
Now that your army is selected, right-click on the §MPale§! province where the rebels are to order your troops to disembark.§W
translation: 你已经点选了你的军队，右键点击发生叛乱的§M佩尔§!省份卸载军队。§W

original: Order your army to §MPale§! to continue.
translation: 命令军队前往§M佩尔§!以继续。

original: §YThe Siege (9/10)§!

You have defeated the rebels on the battlefield, but the city is still under rebel control. Your army is besieging Pale and it will take some time before the defenders will surrender.\n\n§YThe time it takes to perform certain actions, such as sieging, has been reduced in the tutorial. During a regular game things may take longer.§!
translation: 尽管叛军已被消灭，城市仍在叛军控制下。你的军队正在围攻佩尔，距离叛军投降还需要一段时间。\n\n§Y在教程中一些动作花费的时间已被减少，比如围攻，在正常游戏中这些行动花费的时间更长。§!

original: §MReconquer Pale§! to continue.
translation: §M夺回佩尔§!以继续。

original: §YEnd of Chapter (10/10)§!
Victory! You have defeated the rebels and recaptured Pale. You have completed Chapter 2 of the tutorial. In the next chapter you will learn about §MProduction§!.
translation: 大获全胜！你已经击败了叛军重新夺回了佩尔，你已经完成了教程的第二章，下一章将会介绍§M生产§!。

original: You can build ships by selecting a coastal province and clicking the §MBuild Ship§! button. There are four different types of ships: Big Ships, Light Ships, Galleys and Transports.\n\n§YClick §MBack§Y to go back to the province view and then click the §MBuild Ship§Y button.§W
translation: 玩家可以选择一个沿海省份并点击§M修造船只§!按钮修造船只.有四种船只可供修造：重型战舰，轻型战舰，桨帆战舰和运输船。\n\n§Y点击§M返回§Y回到省份界面并点击§M建造船只§Y按钮。§W

original: Click §MBuild Ship§! to continue.
translation: 点击§M建造船只§!以继续。

original: §YProduction Interface (10/12)§!

As an empire grows larger it becomes more difficult to manage. The §MProduction Interface§! will help you with constructing larger amounts of buildings or training troops. Selecting a building from the list will update the mapmode with information regarding where you would get the most benefit.\n\n§YCheck the top-left of the screen.§!
translation: 随着一个帝国变得越来越大，管理它变得更加困难。§M生产界面§! 将帮助您建造更多的建筑物或训练部队。 从列表中选择建筑物将更新地图模式，并提供有关您在哪里能获得最大收益的信息。\n\n§Y请注意屏幕的左上角。§!

original: Click the §MProduction Interface button§! to continue.
translation: 点击§M生产界面按钮§!继续。

original: §YProduction Interface (11/12)§!

Select a unit from the list and then click on the map to start production. You can either click directly on the map or click the '§M+§!' icons. Clicking a province more than once will queue the ship or unit.\n\n§YStart production in 5 different provinces and then remember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 选择列表上一个单位，然后点击地图开始生产。玩家可以直接在地图上点击或者点击 §M+§! 图标。多次点击省份会排列船只和单位。\n\n§Y在 5 个不同省份生产，别忘了恢复暂停的游戏。§!

original: Select any §MLand unit§! from the list to the left and §MRecruit 5 regiments§! to continue.
translation: 从左方列表选择任意§M陆上单位§!，§M招募 5 支军队§!以继续。

original: Move your troops into the Leinster province to engage their army. You must also besiege and occupy their province before you can continue. If you want to bring all your troops you will have to ferry them over and merge them into one army.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 将军队移动到伦斯特和守军开战。必须围攻并占领该省份才能继续。若玩家想派遣所有的军队，必须将军队从海上运过去，编成军队。\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏。§!

original: §YEnd of Chapter (16/16)§!
Mapmodes will change the information given to you on the world map. The next chapter will go through them in more detail.
translation: 地图将会改变世界地图上显示的信息。下一章节将会具体介绍地图。

original: Click §MNext§! to continue to the next chapter.§W
translation: 点击§M下一个§!进入下一章节。§W

original: Click §MNext§! to continue.
translation: 点击§M下一个§!继续。

original: Click §MVenezia§! to continue.
translation: 点击§M威尼斯§!以继续。

original: §YTrade Power (7/11)§!
translation: §Y贸易竞争力（7/11）§!

original: Trade Power directly affects how large portion of trade in a Trade Node you control. Trade Power comes from §Mprovinces§! and from §MLight Ships§! that are protecting trade. There are also Ideas and a §MDiplomatic Advisor§! that affect §MGlobal Trade Power§!.
translation: 贸易竞争力直接影响玩家控制的贸易节点的贸易规模，取决于§M省份§!和保护贸易的§M轻型战舰§!。此外，§M外交顾问§!能够影响§M全局贸易竞争力§!。

original: Select your §Mships§! in port in Venezia.
translation: 选择威尼斯港口的§M船只§!。

original: §YProtect Trade (8/11)§!

Light ships can be ordered to Protect Trade. This means they will patrol the Trade Node and increase the amount of Trade Power you have in that node. Having your ships Protect Trade is very important for increasing trade income.
translation: 轻型船只可被用来保护贸易。它们会在贸易节点巡逻，提升该节点的贸易竞争力。这对于提升贸易收入至关重要。

original: Have your ships §MProtect Trade§! in a Trade Node.
translation: 派遣船只到一处贸易节点§M保护贸易§!。

original: §YRecruitment (1/8)§!

Army recruitment is an important aspect of going to war. Recruitment progress takes place in a province, but can be started in two ways. Either through the §MProduction Interface§! in the top-left or by clicking the §MRecruit Regiment§! button in a province. Each regiment costs 1000 Manpower.
translation: 军队招募是进行战争的一个重要环节。招募在省份内进行，可以使用两种方式。玩家可以通过左上方的§M生产界面§!或者在省份内点击§M招募军队§!按钮，每招募一支军队需要花费1000人力。

original: §YClick the §MProduction Interface§Y in the top-left to continue.
translation: §Y点击左上方的§M生产界面§Y继续。

original: §YRecruitment (2/8)§!
Select a regiment from the list to the left and click the green provinces to start recruitment. Each regiment costs 1000 Manpower as well as ducats.\n\n§YRemember to unpause the game.§!
translation: 在左方列表上选择一个军队，然后点击绿色省份进行招募。每招募一支军队需要花费 1000 人力和一定的金币。\n\n§Y别忘了恢复暂停的游戏。§!

original: §MRecruit 5 Land units§! to continue.
translation: §M招募5个陆军单位§!以继续。

original: §YWar Overview (5/8)§!
The War Overview window gives you an overview of how the war is going, who the belligerents are and who is the war leader of each side. Battles and sieges are listed in the bottom.
translation: 战争概览窗口能告诉玩家战争的进行过程，交战的双方以及双方的首领。战役和攻城列表显示在下方。

original: Click §MNext§! to continue.
translation: 点击§M下一个§!以继续。

original: §YAdvisors (2/18)§!

Advisors boost how many §MMonarch Points§! you gain each month. They cost gold to hire and you also pay them salaries each month. Hiring a more expensive advisor will give you more monthly Monarch Points, but you will gain less gold each month.\n\n§YClick the §MYou have a free Advisor Slot alert§! to go to the §MGovernment§! tab.§W
translation: 你每个月都会得到顾问给你增加的§M君主点数§!。用金币雇佣他们，同时每个月将会发给他们工资。雇佣更贵的顾问将会得到更多的君主点数，但你每个月会得到更少的金币。\n\n§Y点击§M你有一个空闲的顾问槽§!以进入§M政府§!界面查看。§W

original: Open the §MGovernment tab§! to continue.
translation: 打开§M科技界面§!以继续。

original: §YAdvisors (3/18)§!

Advisors boost how many §MMonarch Points§! you gain each month. They cost gold to hire and you also pay them salaries each month. Hiring a more expensive advisor will give you more monthly Monarch Points, but you will gain less gold each month.\n\n§YClick the empty portraits to go to the list of available advisors.§W
translation: 顾问能够增加玩家每月获得的§M君主点数§!。玩家需要花费黄金招募顾问，每月还要发给顾问一定工资。雇佣的顾问越昂贵，君主点数的增加量也越大，但是每月获得黄金就会变少。\n\n§Y点击空白肖像前往可雇佣顾问列表§W

original: §MHire an advisor§! to continue.
translation: §M雇佣一名顾问§!以继续。

original: §YTechnology (13/18)§!
Technology can be unlocked by spending §MMonarch Points§!. Technology is divided into §Mthree categories§! and each category is associated with one of the three Monarch Points.§!
translation: 科技可以通过花费§M君主点数§!解锁。科技可分为§M三种类型§!，每一种类型和一种君主点数相关。§!

original: Open the §MTechnology tab§! to continue.
translation: 打开§M科技界面§!继续。

original: §YTechnology (14/18)§!

Being ahead in Technology will give you a penalty to Technology costs. It is a good idea to plan Technology and Ideas so that the ones you want do not require the same Monarch Points. It is also good to plan in accordance with your Ruler's abilities.
translation: 科技超前将会对你的科技花费造成额外惩罚.合理安排科技和理念以便于更合理的使用君主点数，根据你的统治者的能力来协调安排也是个不错的选择

original: Unlock §MNoble Republic (7)§! to continue.
translation: 解锁§M贵族共和制（7）§!以继续。

original: §YIdea Groups (15/18)§!

Idea Groups can be chosen at specific intervals depending on your §MAdministrative Technology§!. The technology you just researched unlocked your second Idea Group. Idea groups are a way of specializing your country and to make it more unique and stronger at performing certain tasks.
translation: 在特定级别的§M行政科技§!解锁后，你会获得一个理念组栏位。你刚刚解锁的科技帮助你获得了第二个理念组栏位。理念组是帮助你的国家更加专门化的扮演好某一职责的良方。

original: Open the §MIdeas tab§! to continue.
translation: 打开§M理念组界面§!以继续。

original: §YIdea Groups (16/18)§!

Unlocking an Idea in an Idea Group costs §M400 Monarch Points§! of either §MAdministrative§!, §MDiplomatic§! or §MMilitary Power§!. Which Monarch Points are used depends on the Idea Group. It is a good idea to choose an Idea Group that uses Monarch Points of the type you have plenty of.\n\n§YClick the §MFree Slot§! button and then select the §MExploration Ideas§!.§W
translation: 解锁理念组需要付出§M400行政§!、§M外交§!或§M军事§!的§M君主点数§!。而所需君主点数的种类，则随理念组而异。根据你库存充裕的君主点来选择理念组，才是明智的选择。\n\n§Y请点击§M空白的理念槽§!再点击§M探索理念§!。§W

original: Select the §MExploration§! Idea Group to continue.
translation: 选择§M探索§!理念以继续。

original: Unlocking 3 Ideas will also unlock 1 of your §MNational Ideas§!. Most of the larger nations, and some of the smaller ones, have special National Ideas. \n\n§MQuest for the New World§Y is an Idea in the §MExploration§Y Idea Group that allows you to recruit §MExplorers§Y & §MConquistadors§Y. It requires you to first unlock the §MColonial Ventures§Y idea.
translation: 解锁3个理念也会解锁1个你的§M国家理念§!。多数大国和一些小国都拥有独特的国家理念。\n\n§M探索新世界§Y在§M探索§Y理念组中，该理念允许你可以招募§M探险家§Y和§M征服者§Y。该理念的前提为解锁§M开拓殖民地§Y理念。

original: Unlock the §MQuest for the New World§! idea to continue.
translation: 解锁§M探索新世界§!理念以继续。

original: §YExploration (1/8)§!
Exploration and Colonization is an important part in Europa Universalis IV. Discovering new lands and founding new settlements is a relatively peaceful way of expanding your Empire.
translation: 探索和殖民是《欧陆风云IV》的重头戏。探索新大陆、建立殖民地是一个相对和平的帝国扩张方式。

original: Click §MNext§! to continue.
translation: 点击§M下一个§!以继续。

original: §YExploration (2/8)§!

Uncharted lands are hidden by §MTerra Incognita§!. You will need an §MExplorer§! or a §MConquistador§! in order to move into Terra Incognita. To recruit Explorers or Conquistadors you need to first have unlocked the §MQuest for the New World§! idea.
translation: 未知之地被标识为§M未知省份§!。你需要一位§M探险家§!或者§M征服者§!来进入未知省份。招募探险家或征服者需要§M探索新世界§!理念。

original: Select your fleet in §MAndalucia§! to continue.
translation: 选中你位于§M安达卢西亚§!的舰队以继续。

original: §YTerra Incognita (3/8)§!

Explorers lead fleets while Conquistadors lead land armies. Your fleet is lead by Christopher Columbus who is an Explorer.

§YOrder your ships into §MTerra Incognita§Y by right-clicking the area.

Remember to unpause the game.§!
translation:
探险家指挥海军，征服者指挥陆军。目前你的舰队在探险家克里斯多弗·哥伦布的指挥之下。

§Y使用右键点击§M未知区域§Y将舰队移动过去。

记得要取消游戏暂停。§!

original: Have your fleet sail west and §Mfollow the Arrow§! to continue.§W
translation: 将你的舰队§M沿着箭头指示§!驶向西方以继续。§W

original: §YAttrition (4/8)§!

Exploration can be dangerous because of attrition. Whenever your ships are at sea and too for away for supply ships to reach them, they will suffer attrition damage. In a normal game you would have to explore more slowly, taking your ships back for repairs whenever necessary. For the tutorial, however, naval attrition is severely reduced.
translation: 由于损耗，探索可能会充满危险。当你的船队远航难以获得补给时，他们就会损耗。在正常的游戏中，你不得不缓慢的探索，并在必要时召回船队重整旗鼓。不过在教学中，我们把损耗降至很低。

original: Have your fleet sail west and §Mfollow the Arrow§! to continue.§W
translation: 将你的舰队§M沿着箭头指示§!驶向西方以继续。§W
